# File vendor/riddle/lib/riddle/configuration/sql_source.rb, line 16
      def initialize(name, type)
        @name = name
        @type = type
        
        @sql_query_pre        = []
        @sql_attr_uint        = []
        @sql_attr_bool        = []
        @sql_attr_bigint      = []
        @sql_attr_timestamp   = []
        @sql_attr_str2ordinal = []
        @sql_attr_float       = []
        @sql_attr_multi       = []
        @sql_query_post       = []
        @sql_query_post_index = []
        @unpack_zlib          = []
        @unpack_mysqlcompress = []
      end
